pli-tv-bi-vb-pd2:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd2:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo telaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd2:1.1.11: Kassa sampannaṃ na manāpaṃ, kassa sāduṃ na ruccatī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd2:1.1.12: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd2:1.1.13: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā … pe … tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd2:1.1.14: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjissantī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd2:1.1.15: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd2:1.1.18: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd2:1.1.19: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd2:1.1.20: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd2:1.1.21: “Yā pana bhikkhunī dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjeyya, paṭidesetabbaṃ tāya bhikkhuniyā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd2:1.1.22: ‘gārayhaṃ, ayye, dhammaṃ āpajjiṃ asappāyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ, taṃ paṭidesemī’”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd2:1.1.23: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd2:1.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo gilānā honti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd2:1.2.4: “Pubbe mayaṃ, ayye, dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjimhā, tena no phāsu hoti;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd2:1.2.5: idāni pana ‘bhagavatā paṭikkhittan’ti kukkuccāyantā na viññāpema, tena no na phāsu hotī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd2:1.2.7: anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānāya bhikkhuniyā dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjituṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd2:1.2.8: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd8:1.1.1: dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjeyya, paṭidesetabbaṃ tāya bhikkhuniyā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd8:1.1.2: ‘gārayhaṃ, ayye, dhammaṃ āpajjiṃ asappāyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ, taṃ paṭidesemī’”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd8:2.1.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd8:2.1.8: yassā vinā telanā na phāsu hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd8:2.1.20: gokhīraṃ vā ajikākhīraṃ vā mahiṃsakhīraṃ vā yesaṃ maṃsaṃ kappati tesaṃ khīraṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd8:2.1.23: Agilānā attano atthāya viññāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd8:2.2.1: Agilānā agilānasaññā telaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjati, āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd8:2.2.2: Agilānā vematikā telaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjati, āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd8:2.2.3: Agilānā gilānasaññā telaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjati, āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd8:2.3.12: Uddiṭṭhā kho, ayyāyo, aṭṭha pāṭidesanīyā dhammā.
